name: Sasha Jump
description:
Beam me up… maybe? 

After a night out Sasha’s comm device is broken, and who knows where she will teleport next. 

Features:
  • A time hopping adventure that spans approximately four rooms!
  • Cutting edge four color pixel art!
  • Retro game references!
  • No sound!

This is my first Ludum Dare, and my first solo game jam. All code and assets were created by me. I do plan on continuing work on it. Enjoy! :)

Change Log

All changes are bugfixes and should not drastically change the game experience.

Update 1:
  • Fixed a bug that caused colliders to not work in WebGL.
Update 2:
  • Fixed a bug that caused the com device to not work if you spoke to the store clerk first, making the game unbeatable. 
  • Fixed a bug that where time would not stand still when speaking to a bartender
  • Fixed a few small spelling / grammar errors, and restored a missing line of dialog.
